Name: Frivolous Band
Description: Increases Evade Speed by 10%. Perfect Evades increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Speed by 10% for 7s.
Location: Can be found in Yaesha  - The Forbidden Grove. Rewarded to the player by Bedel of the Vaunnt after reviving The Doe in the Ravager encounter. ;Player needs to choose sarcastic answers when first speaking to Bedel and choose "Maybe..." dialogue option when inquired about who saved The Doe. This reminds Bedel about his friend and he gives player the ring.
